name: Who Shot Sid Sidney?!
description:
You've been invited to stay at your music idol's old mansion, but he is unexpectedly... murdered.

Navigate the house, meet the suspects and identify the killer!

Al K.: Background Artist, Character Artist - http://alkeoshkart.wordpress.com

Linda Tran: Background Artist - http://3dlinda.tumblr.com

Liesl A.: Writer, Programmer - http://lieslart.tumblr.com

Made in 3 days at TOJam9!
